name: Cave Drive
description:
Description:
Cave Drive is a feature-rich first-person platformer contained in a single level. Explore a detailed environment while solving puzzles, dodging bullets, and figuring out how to secure a reward! You'll find yourself swinging from grapple points, speeding down ziplines, and more.

Play with Mouse + Keyboard, or enjoy Controller support!


Assets Used:
Uses Starter Content from Unreal Engine, and the following asset packs:
Construction Site Vol. 1 by Dekogon Studios
Industry Props Pack 6 by SilverTim
Vehicle Variety Pack by Switchboard Studios
Soul: Cave by Epic Games
Sound assets from zapsplat.com

Some assets self made.
